game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: The city of Eldarath was said to hold the secrets of the ancient civilization. The artifact, a powerful relic, is rumored to be hidden deep within the ruins.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a boost in reputation

tasks.objective: Gather information about the location of Eldarath
tasks.description: Speak to the villagers and gather any information they may have about the lost city.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient map from the crypt
tasks.description: Explore the nearby crypt and retrieve the map that supposedly leads to Eldarath.

tasks.objective: Navigate through the ruins and reach the artifact chamber
tasks.description: Use the map to navigate through the treacherous ruins and reach the chamber where the artifact is said to be.

tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian of the artifact
tasks.description: Face the fearsome guardian that protects the artifact and emerge victorious.
